documentation.author: Linda VonDrasek and Toni Bush
documentation.purpose: This rule will take Baycare's Admit to Inpatient Status; ICU Adult and Transfer within Facility; ICU Adult to new orders. The orders are Admit to Intensive Care and Transfer to Intensive Care. This is necessary to conform to the Bedrock build for Core Measures 4.2.
documentation.explanation: This rule will take Baycare's Admit to Inpatient Status; ICU Adult and Transfer within Facility; ICU Adult to new orders. The orders are Admit to Intensive Care and Transfer to Intensive Care. This is necessary to conform to the Bedrock build for Core Measures 4.2.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_E
templateDefinitions.definition: an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST for any order(s) in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_NEW
templateDefinitions.definition: Order PROCEDURE PRIORITY and bill code CODE with CHART order comment COMMENT

statements.statement: select ocs.mnemonic,catalog_type=cv.display from order_catalog oc, order_catalog_synonym ocs, code_value cv plan oc where oc.orderable_type_flag not in (2,3,6,8,11) and oc.active_ind = 1 and oc.catalog_type_cd > 0 join cv where cv.code_value = oc.catalog_type_cd and cv.cdf_meaning != "PHARMACY " join ocs where ocs.catalog_cd = oc.catalog_cd and ocs.mnemonic = oc.primary_mnemonic order cnvtupper(ocs.mnemonic)
SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY,C1.DESCRIPTION,C1.CODE_VALUE FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 2054 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
SELECT C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE CODE_SET = 13028 ORDER C1.CODE_VALUE

value.value: System initiated Core Measure Plan for VTE based on Patient Clinical Events.
System initiated based on Clinical Event
